sect1.title: html_radios

row.entry: an array of values for radio buttons
an array of output for radio buttons
Yes, unless using values and output
an associative array of values and output
string of text to separate each radio item

sect1.para: html_radios is a custom function that creates html radio button group with provided data. It takes care of which item is selected by default as well. Required attributes are values and output, unless you use options instead. All output is XHTML compatible.
All parameters that are not in the list above are printed as name/value-pairs inside each of the created <input>-tags.
